@NonNullByDefault

Package com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.transform

Code for model transformations, including variable elimination and junction tree.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JunctionTreeTransform
    This class implements the junction tree transformation on an input model to create a semantically equivalent version of the model that is singly connected and thus can be used for exact inference using belief propagation.
    JunctionTreeTransformMap
    Junction tree mapping generated by JunctionTreeTransform.
    JunctionTreeTransformMap.AddedJointDiscreteVariable  
    JunctionTreeTransformMap.AddedJointVariable<Var extends Variable>
    Represents a variable that joins two or more other variables along an edge between two factors in the target model to ensure that it is singly connected.
    OptionVariableEliminatorCostList
    List of cost functions for use with VariableEliminator.
    VariableEliminator
    Computes a variable elimination order for a factor graph using a greedy algorithm over various cost functions.
    VariableEliminator.CostFunction  
    VariableEliminator.MinFill
    Cost is the number of edges that would be added if this variable were to be eliminated from the current graph, i.e the number of unique neighbor variable pairs that are not already adjacent to each other.
    VariableEliminator.MinNeighbors
    Cost is the number of neighbors of the variable in the current graph.
    VariableEliminator.MinWeight
    Cost is the product of the domain cardinalities of all of the neighboring variables in the current graph.
    VariableEliminator.Ordering
    Holds a variable elimination ordering along with statistics for its derivation.
    VariableEliminator.OrderIterator
    Produces a variable elimination order based on a given variable cost function.
    VariableEliminator.Stats
    Elimination quality statistics computed for an ordering.
    VariableEliminator.Var
    Holds information about a single variable for use by variable eliminator.
    VariableEliminator.VarLink
    A node in a linked list of VariableEliminator.Var entries.
    VariableEliminator.WeightedMinFill
    Similar to VariableEliminator.MinFill but instead of counting edges that would be added, it counts the sum of the weights of added edges where the weight is the product of the domain cardinalities at each end.
    VariableEliminatorCostListOptionKey
    Key for options with list of variable eliminator cost functions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    VariableEliminator.VariableCost
    Describes the standard built-in variable cost functions supported by VariableEliminator.

Package com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.transform Description
